data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 342 believers in South West Garo Hills that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in South West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in South West Garo Hills. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of South West Garo Hills.

Jesus, I pray that all the Koch (Hindu traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Koch (Hindu traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Koch (Hindu traditions) people is yours.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of South West Garo Hills words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in South West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.focus_label: South West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of South West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: South West Garo Hills
location.full_name: South West Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India
location.people_groups_list: Sabar, Hajang, Koch (Muslim traditions), Hajang Banai, Halam
